biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" by his peers, is a formidable competitor hailing from Hirsala Golf. Beyond his prowess on the course, Jarkko is known for his disciplined approach to the game. Colleagues describe him as an even-tempered player, never allowing external distractions to affect his game.

His record at the Hector Trophée is impressive, with eight past appearances. Jarkko has demonstrated his ability to perform under pressure and emerge victorious. He has claimed the coveted Hector Trophée once, and also boasts one Victor Trophy for best individual performance.

The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Jarkko's ninth appearance in the competition. With his experience and unwavering focus, Jarkko is undoubtedly one to watch as he seeks to add to his list of accomplishments.
